import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { Users } from "../../dummyData.js"; export default function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like); const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(false); const likeHandler = () => { setLike(isLiked ? like - 1 : like + 1); } return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}dsds
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
